channel.title: Skycoin Checkpoint System on Skycoin Project Material
channel.description: Recent content in Skycoin Checkpoint System on Skycoin Project Material

item.title: Development Update #9 - March 21, 2014
item.description: Summary Wire protocol almost done Deterministic wallets RPC almost done (in branch) Fixing wallet GUI to match new RPC Windows, OSX and linux build scripts are done We are working towards a launch where the coin is trading as soon as possible. After launch, there is still work to do. Skycoin Checkpoint System This is overview of the Skycoin checkpoint system. The checkpoint system addresses the exponential growth of the blockchain, by keeping the data required to run a full client to less than one gigabyte.
